lead_paragraph: Deputy Inspector James Grant was among several officials disciplined in connection with the investigation into the conduct of two businessmen with ties to Mayor Bill de Blasio.

headline.print_headline: Police Official Files for Retirement Amid Federal Corruption Inquiry
headline.main: New York Police Official Files for Retirement Amid Corruption Inquiry

snippet: Deputy Inspector James Grant was among several officials disciplined in connection with the investigation into the conduct of two businessmen with ties to Mayor Bill de Blasio.
abstract: Deputy Inspector James Grant, New York City police commander stripped of badge and gun amid corruption investigation, files for retirement; Police Dept has 30 days to consider his notice or to bring departmental charges against him.
